text: Steve Brûlé (born January 15, 1975) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey player. He last played competitively with Jonquière Marquis of the Ligue Nord-Américaine de Hockey. He played in the National Hockey League with the New Jersey Devils and Colorado Avalanche. ==Career statistics== ===Regular season and playoffs=== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts
